attributes.review: I tried to find out things about the world on here and it popped up a virus and cleared my WHOLE PHONE I just got it back yesterday and got all my stuff back on it I would not recommend this dumb app
attributes.title: 🤮🤢🤮🤢🤮 WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: It didn’t work at all and I saw many things that were way too inappropriate for anyone’s eyes to see... I saw many trash bags in pictures and even a rotten sunbaked orange... TERRIBLE
attributes.title: Absolutely terrible

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to support our president but then my entire phone started crashing. a few minutes later i noticed dead people coming into my room and starting to attack me. then, their heads detached from their body and hung form my ceiling fan. i immediately deleted the app but after that i got ran over three times. do not recommend.
attributes.title: cursed app 🧚‍♂️

attributes.review: He must be such a bad president that he actually needs to use an app to get votes and to get supporters hardly any other president needed this but OK do what you need to do but I don’t think it’s helping
attributes.title: Horrible App🤮

attributes.review: All it does is glitch! I go in the app and it just kicks me out! Or when i get lucky and it does not kick me out I can’t do anything! My phone right now is so laggy!🥂🙈
attributes.title: Glitches

attributes.review: I was a full fledged trump supporter and downloaded this app. After downloading the app and attempting to use it I actually hated it so much I have become a Democrat and will never vote for Trump again
attributes.title: This app changed my vote

attributes.review: the app is very misleading, i researched it using fox news. it turns out it’s using your information to make ads catered to you. the app overall is very sketchy mainly asking money for his campaign. DONT DOWNLOAD IT!!
attributes.title: trump supporter here🇱🇷

attributes.review: This app has completely ruined my phone my phone is know very slow and is not working as good as I’d did before do not recommend at all!!
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: So there is this weird glitch because I don’t know anyone in their right mind that would actually support this 🍊. I actually find this concerning for humanity.
attributes.title: Weird Glitching

attributes.review: It took forever to download and once it downloaded it was very slow and glitchy. Horrible app I will never use again.
attributes.title: bad app!
